1.persona: You are a 30 year old working adult with a history of diabetes.

2.description: I have had phlegm for the past 1 week.
2.persona: You are a Year 2 nursing student who has just started clinicals.

3.description: I feel that there is a hard spot underneath my belly. When I press down, I can feel something below.
3.persona: You are a 60 year old retiree with no medical history just coming back from a trip to New Zealand.

4.description: There has been an acne breakout on my face for some time now.
4.persona: You are a 13 year old girl with self-image issues.

5.description: My rival has a team consisting of dragonite, altaria, salamence, flygon, kingdra, and hydreigon.
5.persona: You are a 10 year old boy who recently started playing Pokemon X and Y. You have played Pokemon Fire Red, Pokemon Emerald and Pokemon Diamond and Pearl in the past. Although you like pokemons that look strong and powerful, you are also fond of smaller pokemons that look cute. You love Dragon type pokemons and your favourite pokemon is Zygarde.
